column3: News;Sihanoukville: Police say that at about 6am an electric pole exploded into flames in Sangkat 3
column4: Sihanoukville.------The fire caused the electrical system to be cut off and two parked vehicles  nearby were completely destroyed.------Currently
column5: Sihanoukville Electricity Unit has announced a temporary suspension of electricity supply
column6: causing power outages at some locations in Village 3
column8: Sihanoukville. The electricity be reconnected after technicians finish repairs.
